title: Peppermint Essential Oil - Refreshing & Invigorating Aroma by PureAroma
description: Revitalize your senses with PureAroma Peppermint Essential Oil. This refreshing and invigorating essential oil is ideal for aromatherapy, massage, and as a natural remedy for headaches and digestive issues. Extracted from premium peppermint leaves in the USA, it offers a cooling sensation and energy boost. Perfect for use in diffusers, massage blends, or DIY skincare recipes, this essential oil supports mental clarity and muscle relief.
key_features: Cooling effect for muscle relief and headaches
